name: Alpine Road Sledding - eXtreme Crazy Winter Snow Racing Adventure Game FREE
name_original: Alpine Road Sledding - eXtreme Crazy Winter Snow Racing Adventure Game FREE
description:
Sled forever in this extreme winter racing game! The best part of winter is going outside to sled but it’s no fun walking up hills. Well this sledder has strapped turbo fans to his back and now can go anywhere. Blast through a winter canyon, dodge falling boulders and see how far you can go before smashing into rocks. Grab it today!

Features
- Cool Snow Tube Rider with turbo fans
- High quality 3D graphics
- Falling rock hazards
